entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 7 April 2023
